com.salimov.yurii.controller.client

Class ClientMainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.controller.other.MainController
      • com.salimov.yurii.controller.client.ClientMainController

  • @Controller
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.service")
public class ClientMainController
extends MainController
    The class implements a set of methods for working with main ModelAndView objects for clients. Class methods create and return modelsAndView, depending on the request. For the work used implementation of the interface CacheMVFabric with implementation ClientMVFabric interface.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    CaptchaService, ClientMVFabric, CompanyService, UserService, ResponseService, SenderService

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        @RequestMapping(value="/send_message",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView sendMessage(@RequestParam(value="url")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String url,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="phone")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String phone,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="message")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String userMessage,
                                                                                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Send client message and redirect by url if it is not blank, otherwise by url /. Request mapping: /send_message Method: POST
        Parameters:
        url - a url of the page which must be to redirect.
        name - a client name.
        phone - a phone name.
        email - a email name.
        userMessage - a client message.
        request - a implementation of the interface to provide request information for HTTP servlets.
        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.
        See Also:
        SenderService

        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.

        text - a sender text.
